name: Tiny Invasion
description:
TUTORIAL:

Player1 (Human):

Reduce Player 2's(Alien)  health down to 0 protect the cows from abduction. Use Right/Left arrowkeys to move and leftclick to shoot.

Player2 (Alien):

Abduct all 3 cows. Avoid getting killed by Player 1 (Human). A/D to move. Q to deploy stunbot.
